title: The Painting ship
creator_credit: Franz-Josef Spieker, Houwer Films and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: The teachers on the Painting Ship, a floating workshop moored in the canals of Amsterdam, believe that creative artistic expression helps a child discover and develop their personality as well as become more sensitive to their cultural environment. This documentary film follows the children around as they react to the sights and sounds around them.
